perguntas.pergunta: An atmosphere is a layer or a set of layers of gases.
The atmosphere of Earth is composed of Nitrogen, Oxygen, Argon and Helium.
In terms of percent the Nitrogen present on the Atmosphere is 78%.
To Geology the Atmosphere acts to shape a planetary surface.
The lowest layer of the Atmosphere is the Mesosphere.
The layer of the Atmosphere where atoms and molecules escape into space is called the Exosphere.
The Mesosphere can reach the temperature of -90Â°C.
